## ðŸ›  Installation

- Install AstroNvim

```sh
git clone https://github.com/AstroNvim/AstroNvim.git ~/.config/nvim
```

- Install User Settings

```sh
git clone https://github.com/bouni/AstroNvimConfig ~/.config/nvim/lua/user
```
